reporting-org.narrative: Ministry for Foreign Affairs of Finland

description.narrative: - Conduct an assessment on challenges and capacity needs of the private sector for enhanced environmental compliance- Develop environmental code of conduct for private establishmentsThis is done to enhance the private sector's responsiveness to environment al protection.This will result in better knowledge and understanding of environmental management among the private sector to correct existing and future projects for the betterment of the community. The beneficiaries are Private businesses government insti tutions and the general public. The Co workers are the Chamber of Commerce in Ethiopia Environmental Protection Authority the Charities and the Societies Agency and community members. The implementing agency is Organization for Social Development. OSD has been selected as it is working on environmental protection which is within the thematic focus of the FLC through the promotion of Corporate Social Responsibility among the business sector that is growing in Ethiopia. (website: osdethiopia.org)
